venue.address_2: Opposite Sears entrance at Galleria Ma
venue.name: VFW

item.description:
Attention – Singers, Songwriters & Musicians!! Come Rock out at the Wed Night Open mike! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge, pool table, inexpensive drinks. ($2.75 beer $3.75 imported, $3 wine.) Play solo or with backing band or just come to party and dance.

All instruments and styles welcome – originals, covers, blues, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Temptations/motown/soul style group singing is especially favored. If you sing and/or play we can back you up with drums, bass, guitar, etc. Pool table. When RSVPing post songs you would like to do.

Crystal Bar VFW across from the Sears Entrance of the Galleria Mall. 59 1st Street, East Cambridge. Be our guest at the open mike Wed night. Email with questions or to sign up and tell your song selections (guarantees an early slot in the line up), or just show up. Starts at 7PM. Any further questions email host. This event is linked with 2 other musician groups & other social groups.
item.name: Dog Day Afternoon: Open Mic, Music, Singing, Networking and Pool Party
